meanings.definition: The quality or state of being firm.
meanings.sent2: The firmnesses of the ground made walking easy.
meanings.sent3: The cake's firmnesses surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: His decision had the firmnesses of a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The firmnesses of the teacher's voice commanded attention.

meanings.definition: The act of being firm or resolute.
meanings.sent1: His firmnesses in negotiations impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She showed firmnesses in sticking to her beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's firmnesses in chasing its tail were adorable.
meanings.sent4: The firmnesses of her resolve were unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The firmnesses of his refusal left no room for argument.

meanings.definition: The degree of resistance to pressure or bending.
meanings.sent1: The firmnesses of the steel beam prevented it from bending.
meanings.sent2: The mattress's firmnesses provided excellent back support.
meanings.sent3: The firmnesses of the rubber band made it hard to stretch.
meanings.sent4: The firmnesses of the tree trunk withstood the strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The firmnesses of the clay sculpture gave it a solid feel.
